attributes.action: Charge the Murderers of Drummer Lee Rigby with Trasons
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned Urge the Home Office and CPS to bring charges of TREASON against the men accused of murdering Drummer Lee Rigby on 22nd May 2013. The video evidense available of statements made by the attackers after this attack will make this charge of Treson justified and if convicted will allow the ulitmate sanction of life imprisionment without parole.

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter for the Metropolitan Police Service.
